info.name: Blackboard Saxion
info.description:
The default saxion styling is horrible. So i've fixed it!
I do not own the rights to the background image inside the header, and it will potentially break as it is not on my own host.
info.additionalInfo:
Make sure you apply this to "URL on Domain" leren.saxion.nl and blackboard.saxion.nl

This code is only for saxion blackboard.
